extractions_raw: [Extraction(extraction_class='NORM', extraction_text='Las puertas previstas como salida de planta o de edificio y las previstas para la evacuación de más de 50 personas serán abatibles con eje de giro vertical y su sistema de cierre, o bien no actuará mientras haya actividad en las zonas a evacuar, o bien consistirá en un dispositivo de fácil y rápida apertura desde el lado del cual provenga dicha evacuación, sin tener que utilizar una llave y sin tener que actuar sobre más de un mecanismo.', char_interval=CharInterval(start_pos=53, end_pos=79), alignment_status=<AlignmentStatus.MATCH_LESSER: 'match_lesser'>, extraction_index=1, group_index=0, description=None, attributes={'id': 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-1234-567890abcdef', 'parent_section_id': '6', 'paragraph_number': 1, 'obligation_type': 'MANDATORY', 'norm_statement': 'Doors intended as floor or building exits and those intended for the evacuation of more than 50 people must be swing doors with a vertical pivot axis, and their locking system must either not operate while there is activity in the areas to be evacuated, or consist of a device for easy and quick opening from the evacuation side, without needing a key and without operating more than one mechanism.', 'applies_if': "DOOR.TYPE IN ['EXIT.FLOOR', 'EXIT.BUILDING'] OR DOOR.EVACUATION.CAPACITY > 50", 'satisfied_if': "DOOR.TYPE == 'SWING' AND DOOR.PIVOT_AXIS == 'VERTICAL' AND (DOOR.LOCKING_SYSTEM.OPERATIONAL == FALSE OR (DOOR.OPENING.EASY_AND_QUICK == TRUE AND DOOR.OPENING.SIDE == 'EVACUATION' AND DOOR.OPENING.REQUIRES_KEY == FALSE AND DOOR.OPENING.MECHANISMS_COUNT <= 1))", 'exempt_if': "DOOR.TYPE == 'AUTOMATIC'", 'topics': ['SAFETY.FIRE', 'SAFETY.USE'], 'project_dimensions': {'PROJECT.TYPE': ['NEW', 'REFORM']}, 'priority': 5, 'priority_factors': {'severity': 0.9, 'likelihood': 0.9, 'impact': 0.8}, 'relevant_tags': ['DOOR.TYPE', 'DOOR.EVACUATION.CAPACITY', 'DOOR.PIVOT_AXIS', extraction_text='Se considera que satisfacen el anterior requisito funcional los dispositivos de apertura mediante manilla o pulsador conforme a la norma UNE-EN 179:2009, cuando se trate de la evacuación de zonas ocupadas por personas que en su mayoría estén familiarizados con la puerta considerada, así como en caso contrario, cuando se trate de puertas con apertura en el sentido de la evacuación conforme al punto 3 siguiente, los de barra horizontal de empuje o de deslizamiento conforme a la norma UNE EN 1125:2009.', char_interval=CharInterval(start_pos=586, end_pos=1090), alignment_status=<AlignmentStatus.MATCH_EXACT: 'match_exact'>, extraction_index=2, group_index=1, description=None, attributes={'id': 'b2c3d4e5-f678-9012-3456-7890abcdef01', 'parent_section_id': '6', 'paragraph_number': 2, 'obligation_type': 'MANDATORY', 'norm_statement': 'Opening devices via handle or push button conforming to UNE-EN 179:2009 are considered to satisfy the previous functional requirement when evacuating areas occupied by people mostly familiar with the door. Otherwise, for doors opening in the direction of evacuation as per point 3, horizontal push or slide bars conforming to UNE EN 1125:2009 are considered to satisfy the requirement.', 'applies_if': 'TRUE', 'satisfied_if': "(DOOR.OPENING_DEVICE.TYPE IN ['HANDLE', 'PUSH_BUTTON'] AND DOOR.OPENING_DEVICE.COMPLIES_WITH_STANDARD == 'UNE-EN 179:2009' AND EVACUATION.OCCUPANTS.FAMILIARITY == 'HIGH') ; OR (DOOR.OPENING_DEVICE.TYPE IN ['HORIZONTAL_PUSH_BAR', 'SLIDE_BAR'] AND DOOR.OPENING_DEVICE.COMPLIES_WITH_STANDARD == 'UNE EN 1125:2009' AND DOOR.OPENING.DIRECTION == 'EVACUATION' AND EVACUATION.OCCUPANTS.FAMILIARITY == 'LOW')", 'exempt_if': 'FALSE', 'topics': ['SAFETY.FIRE', 'SAFETY.USE'], 'project_dimensions': {'PROJECT.TYPE': ['NEW', 'REFORM']}, 'priority': 4, de 200 personas en edificios de uso Residencial Vivienda o de 100 personas en los demás casos, o bien. b) prevista para más de 50 ocupantes del recinto o espacio en el que esté situada.', char_interval=CharInterval(start_pos=1095, end_pos=1155), alignment_status=<AlignmentStatus.MATCH_LESSER: 'match_lesser'>, extraction_index=3, group_index=2, description=None, attributes={'id': 'c3d4e5f6-7890-1234-5678-90abcdef0123', 'parent_section_id': '6', 'paragraph_number': 3, 'obligation_type': 'MANDATORY', 'norm_statement': 'Every exit door must open in the direction of evacuation if it is intended for the passage of more than 200 people in residential housing buildings or 100 people in other cases, or if it is intended for more than 50 occupants of the enclosure or space where it is located.', 'applies_if': "(DOOR.EVACUATION.CAPACITY > 200 AND BUILDING.USAGE == 'RESIDENTIAL.HOUSING') OR (DOOR.EVACUATION.CAPACITY > 100 AND BUILDING.USAGE != 'RESIDENTIAL.HOUSING') OR (DOOR.EVACUATION.OCCUPANTS > 50)", 'satisfied_if': "DOOR.OPENING.DIRECTION == 'EVACUATION'", 'exempt_if': 'FALSE', 'topics': ['SAFETY.FIRE', 'SAFETY.USE'], 'project_dimensions': {'PROJECT.TYPE': ['NEW', 'REFORM']}, 'priority': 5, 'priority_factors': {'severity': 0.9, 'likelihood': 0.9, 'impact': 0.8}, 'relevant_tags': ['DOOR.EVACUATION.CAPACITY', 'BUILDING.USAGE.RESIDENTIAL.HOUSING', 'DOOR.EVACUATION.OCCUPANTS', 'DOOR.OPENING.DIRECTION'], 'relevant_roles': [], 'lifecycle_phase': [], 'location_scope': {'COUNTRY': 'ES'}, 'source': {'span_char_start': None, 'span_char_end': None, 'visual_refs': []}, 'extracted_parameters': ['DOOR.EVACUATION.CAPACITY > 200', 'DOOR.EVACUATION.CAPACITY > 100', 'DOOR.EVACUATION.OCCUPANTS > 50'], 'consequence_ids': [], 'confidence': 0.95, 'uncertainty': 0.05, 'notes': 'Criteria for determining the number of people are established in section 4.1 of this Section.'}), Extraction(extraction_class='NORM', extraction_text='Cuando existan puertas giratorias, deben disponerse puertas abatibles de apertura manual contiguas a ellas, excepto en el caso de que las giratorias sean automáticas y dispongan de un sistema que permita el abatimiento de sus hojas en el sentido de la evacuación, ante una emergencia o incluso en el caso de fallo de suministro eléctrico, mediante la aplicación manual de una fuerza no superior a 220 N. La anchura útil de este tipo de puertas y de las de giro automático después de su abatimiento, debe estar dimensionada para la evacuación total prevista.', char_interval=CharInterval(start_pos=1587, end_pos=2144), alignment_status=<AlignmentStatus.MATCH_EXACT: 'match_exact'>, extraction_index=4, group_index=3, description=None, attributes={'id': 'd4e5f678-9012-3456-7890-abcdef012345', 'parent_section_id': '6', 'paragraph_number': 4, 'obligation_type': 'MANDATORY', 'norm_statement': 'When revolving doors exist, adjacent manually operated swing doors must be provided, unless the revolving doors are automatic and have a system that allows their leaves to swing open in the direction of evacuation during an emergency or power failure, by applying a manual force not exceeding 220 N. The clear width of these types of doors and automatic revolving doors after swinging open must be dimensioned for the total planned evacuation.', 'applies_if': "DOOR.TYPE == 'REVOLVING'", 'satisfied_if': "DOOR.ADJACENT_DOOR.TYPE == 'SWING' AND DOOR.ADJACENT_DOOR.OPERATION == 'MANUAL' ; OR (DOOR.TYPE == 'REVOLVING' AND DOOR.OPERATION == 'AUTOMATIC' AND DOOR.SWING_OPEN_SYSTEM.EXISTS == TRUE AND DOOR.SWING_OPEN_SYSTEM.DIRECTION == 'EVACUATION' AND (DOOR.SWING_OPEN_SYSTEM.ACTIVATION_CONDITION IN ['EMERGENCY', 'POWER_FAILURE']) AND DOOR.SWING_OPEN_SYSTEM.MANUAL_FORCE <= 220 AND DOOR.CLEAR_WIDTH.DIMENSIONED_FOR_TOTAL_EVACUATION == TRUE)", 'exempt_if': 'FALSE', 'topics': ['SAFETY.FIRE', 'SAFETY.USE'], 'project_dimensions': {'PROJECT.TYPE': ['NEW', 'REFORM']}, 'priority': 5, 'priority_factors': {'severity': 0.9, 'likelihood': 0.9, 'impact': 0.8}, 'relevant_tags': ['DOOR.TYPE.REVOLVING', 'DOOR.TYPE.SWING', 'DOOR.OPERATION.MANUAL', 'DOOR.OPERATION.AUTOMATIC', 'DOOR.SWING_OPEN_SYSTEM', 'DOOR.CLEAR_WIDTH'], 'relevant_roles': [], 'lifecycle_phase': [], 'location_scope': {'COUNTRY': 'ES'}, 'source': {'span_char_start': None, 'span_char_end': None, 'visual_refs': []}, 'extracted_parameters': ['DOOR.SWING_OPEN_SYSTEM.MANUAL_FORCE <= 220 N'], 'consequence_ids': [], 'confidence': 0.95, 'uncertainty': 0.05, 'notes': ''}), Extraction(extraction_class='NORM', extraction_text='Las puertas peatonales automáticas dispondrán de un sistema que en caso de fallo en el suministro eléctrico o en caso de señal de emergencia, cumplirá las siguientes condiciones, excepto en posición de cerrado seguro: a) Que, cuando se trate de una puerta corredera o plegable, abra y mantenga la puerta abierta o bien permita su apertura abatible en el sentido de la evacuación mediante simple empuje con una fuerza total que no exceda de 220 N. La opción de apertura abatible no se admite cuando la puerta esté situada en un itinerario accesible según DB SUA. b) Que, cuando se trate de una puerta abatible o giro-batiente (oscilo-batiente), abra y mantenga la puerta abierta o bien permita su abatimiento en el sentido de la evacuación mediante simple empuje con una fuerza total que no exceda de 150 N. Cuando la puerta esté situada en un itinerario accesible según DB SUA, dicha fuerza no excederá de 25 N, en general, y de 65 N cuando sea resistente al fuego.', char_interval=CharInterval(start_pos=2149, end_pos=2366), alignment_status=<AlignmentStatus.MATCH_LESSER: 'match_lesser'>, extraction_index=5, group_index=4, description=None, attributes={'id': 'e5f67890-1234-5678-90ab-cdef01234567', 'parent_section_id': '6', 'paragraph_number': 5, 'obligation_type': 'MANDATORY', 'norm_statement': 'Automatic pedestrian doors must have a system that, in case of power failure or emergency signal, meets the following conditions, except in a secure closed position: a) For sliding or folding doors, it must open and keep the door open or allow it to swing open in the direction of evacuation with a total force not exceeding 220 N. The swing-open option is not allowed if the door is on an accessible route according to DB SUA. b) For swing or tilt-and-turn doors, it must open and keep the door open or allow it to swing open in the direction of evacuation with a total force not exceeding 150 N. If the door is on an accessible route according to DB SUA, this force must not exceed 25 N generally, and 65 N if fire-resistant.', 'applies_if': "DOOR.TYPE == 'AUTOMATIC.PEDESTRIAN' AND DOOR.POSITION != 'SECURE_CLOSED' AND (EVENT.TYPE == 'POWER_FAILURE' OR EVENT.TYPE == 'EMERGENCY_SIGNAL')", 'satisfied_if': "(DOOR.TYPE IN ['SLIDING', 'FOLDING'] AND (DOOR.STATE == 'OPEN' OR (DOOR.SWING_OPEN_ENABLED == TRUE AND DOOR.SWING_OPEN.DIRECTION == 'EVACUATION' AND DOOR.SWING_OPEN.FORCE <= 220 AND NOT (DOOR.LOCATION.ACCESSIBLE_ROUTE == TRUE AND DOOR.COMPLIES_WITH_DB_SUA == TRUE)))) ; OR (DOOR.TYPE IN ['SWING', 'TILT_AND_TURN'] AND (DOOR.STATE == 'OPEN' OR (DOOR.SWING_OPEN_ENABLED == TRUE AND DOOR.SWING_OPEN.DIRECTION == 'EVACUATION' AND DOOR.SWING_OPEN.FORCE <= 150 AND NOT (DOOR.LOCATION.ACCESSIBLE_ROUTE == TRUE AND DOOR.COMPLIES_WITH_DB_SUA == TRUE AND DOOR.SWING_OPEN.FORCE > 25 AND NOT (DOOR.FIRE_RESISTANT == TRUE AND DOOR.SWING_OPEN.FORCE > 65)))))", 'exempt_if': 'FALSE', 'topics': ['SAFETY.FIRE', 'SAFETY.USE', 'ACCESSIBILITY'], 'project_dimensions': {'PROJECT.TYPE': ['NEW', 'REFORM']}, 'priority': 5, 'priority_factors': {'severity': 0.9, 'likelihood': 0.9, 'impact': 0.8}, 'relevant_tags': ['DOOR.TYPE.AUTOMATIC.PEDESTRIAN', 'DOOR.POSITION', 'EVENT.TYPE.POWER_FAILURE', 'EVENT.TYPE.EMERGENCY_SIGNAL', 'DOOR.TYPE.SLIDING', 'DOOR.TYPE.FOLDING', 'DOOR.STATE.OPEN', 'DOOR.SWING_OPEN_ENABLED', 'DOOR.SWING_OPEN.DIRECTION', 'DOOR.SWING_OPEN.FORCE', 'DOOR.LOCATION.ACCESSIBLE_ROUTE', 'DOOR.COMPLIES_WITH_DB_SUA', 'DOOR.TYPE.SWING', 'DOOR.TYPE.TILT_AND_TURN', 'DOOR.FIRE_RESISTANT'], 'relevant_roles': [], 'lifecycle_phase': [], 'location_scope': {'COUNTRY': 'ES'}, 'source': {'span_char_start': None, 'span_char_end': None, 'visual_refs': []}, 'extracted_parameters': ['DOOR.SWING_OPEN.FORCE <= 220 N', 'DOOR.SWING_OPEN.FORCE <= 150 N', 'DOOR.SWING_OPEN.FORCE <= 25 N', 'DOOR.SWING_OPEN.FORCE <= 65 N'], 'consequence_ids': [], 'confidence': 0.95, 'uncertainty': 0.05, 'notes': 'Force is applied statically at the edge of the leaf, perpendicular to it and at a height of 1000 ±10 mm.'}), Extraction(extraction_class='NORM', 'parent_section_id': '6', 'paragraph_number': 5, 'obligation_type': 'MANDATORY', 'norm_statement': 'Automatic pedestrian doors must obligatorily comply with maintenance conditions according to UNE
